<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create Variant Pay Link URL"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/paylinks/generate-variant/{paylinkId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The **Create Variant Pay Link URL** endpoint enables you to create a customized version of an existing payment link, allowing you to modify key elements such as the amount and currency. This functionality is ideal for scenarios where you need to offer personalized payment options, such as discounts, special pricing, or promotions, while maintaining the original planâ€™s integrity.

> ðŸ“˜ Note
> 
> You can use this endpoint to offer discounts or custom pricing by creating a variant of an existing paylink.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Unique identifier of the payment link.","name":"paylinkId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Amount to be associated with the payment link variant.","name":"amount","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Currency to be associated with the payment link variant.","name":"currency","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Customer identifier to record as `customer.reference`.","name":"customer_ident","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"URL to redirect customer after a successful payment.","name":"redirect_to","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
